column4: Hi - CD Audio (using rythmbox plays intermittently, for say 10 seconds, then stops. I don't get any audio at all from KsCD. Using Hardy 8.04LTS - any suggestions? I'm pretty sure all the codecs are on.
Try running ryhthmbox from console and see if any errors crop up..
Hmm.. maybe give Exaile a spin..?
You might also try apt-get reinstall rythmbox
